summary: The client requested to recreate Sprint 1, and Mike, the Sprint Planning Architect, proposed a new Sprint 1 focused on foundational user stories US-006 (Basic Authentication and Role-Based Access) and US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration) to establish secure auth and backend setup before other features.

actions.task: Review proposed Sprint 1 and provide preferences or tweaks

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed new Sprint 1 grouping US-006 and US-008 for foundational auth and backend

risks.risk: Premature inclusion of UI polish like STYLE-001 before foundations
risks.mitigation: Prioritize code-gen user stories and defer styling to later sprints
Alternative to focus solely on US-006 if needed, but pair with US-008 for maximum progress
